ISSUE.TITLE: Stray div in admin when using blog recipe
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When using the SaaS setup recipe, no stray div tag is present. When using the Blog recipe, a stray div tag is present in the output. `Error: Stray end tag div.` There are also other html errors. I think I should list them seperately.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Revert small change that should be fixed in different PR. See https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/issues/7222
